item.title: Advanced Customisation
item.description: There are a few ways you can make style changes to Congo. Colour schemes # Congo ships with a few colour schemes out of the box. To change the basic colour scheme, you can set the colorScheme theme parameter to one of the default configurations. Valid options are congo (the default), avocado, fire and ocean. In addition to the default scheme, you can also create your own and restyle the entire website to your liking.
